mainObjective: Uncover the reason behind the recent animal attacks threatening Greenwatch Village.

plotPoints.title: Approaching Watcher's Rise
plotPoints.description: The party arrives at the dread-looming Watcher's Rise, tasked with investigating why a strange red mist is rising from the old ruin and unsettling the wilds. As they approach the entrance, they sense an unnatural vigilance from the cyclopean statues and the chilling air, suggesting the place awakens to their presence. The entrance is sealed by a puzzle involving the gemstone eyes of the statues.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Successfully entering Watcher's Rise advances the party to explore its haunted halls and confront the ancient vigilance that lingers within.

sideQuests.title: Omen in the Mosaic
sideQuests.description: An intricate mosaic at the entrance depicts an ancient ritual. Careful study may reveal a warning or a clue to bypassing the initial traps within.
sideQuests.plotImpact: A successful investigation grants advantage on checks against the first tier of dungeon traps.

plotPoints.title: Hall of Unblinking Guardians
plotPoints.description: Within the spiraling corridors, the party faces magical surveillance—animated statues whose gemstone eyes follow every move, triggering traps or summoning spectral sentinels. The party must decide whether to engage these guardians directly, sneak past, or attempt to deactivate their magical vigilance.
plotPoints.plotImpact: How the party deals with the guardians affects later encounters—hasty combat may exhaust resources, while clever bypass or negotiation could make future challenges easier.

sideQuests.title: The Silent Watcher's Plea
sideQuests.description: One damaged statue whispers a fragmented warning about the 'Curator Below.' If the party repairs or communes with it magically, they may learn secrets about the dungeon's creator.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Uncovering this information could allow the party to avoid certain traps or negotiate with the final guardian.

plotPoints.title: Chamber of Reflected Sins
plotPoints.description: Crossing a great cracked mosaic, the party enters a chamber where their movements trigger illusions—echoes of past trespassers and guardians replayed in spectral form. Here, they must face riddles or confrontations drawn from the dungeon's memory, testing their resolve and morality.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Decisions made here affect the final guardian’s disposition and the answers available in the climactic confrontation.

sideQuests.title: The Unfinished Confession
sideQuests.description: An apparition of a past intruder begs for help finishing a confession scrawled on the wall in ancient script. Translating and heeding the warning may grant the party a boon or key.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Completing the confession provides a keyword useful in the final confrontation or allows bypass of a dangerous magical ward.

sideQuests.title: Echoes of the Past
sideQuests.description: By interacting with echoes or illusions, the party may learn about the original purpose of Watcher’s Rise and its fall from grace.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Understanding the history can help the party roleplay or negotiate with the dungeon’s denizens.

plotPoints.title: The Vigilant Curator
plotPoints.description: Deep within the heart of Watcher’s Rise, the party faces Caretaker Voss, the ageless guardian entwined with the dungeon’s magic and memory. The Curator confronts the party, challenging their right to trespass and the choices made along the way. Depending on prior actions, this can become a negotiation, desperate battle, or chance to end the cycle of vigilance binding Watcher’s Rise.
plotPoints.plotImpact: The outcome decides the fate of Watcher's Rise: it may be cleansed and repurposed, left dormant, or its curse may intensify, shaping the region’s future.

sideQuests.title: The Gemstone Bargain
sideQuests.description: Caretaker Voss may be persuaded to release the dungeon’s spirits if given a memento or if the party agrees to take up a new vigil.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Completing this bargain offers unique rewards or responsibilities, influencing future adventures in the region.
